mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLANTS_TB (PL_NAME, USER_ID, PL_LOC, PL_POWER, BS_NUM, PL_ISJOIN) VALUES (#{pl_name}, #{user_id}, #{pl_loc}, #{pl_power}, #{bs_num}, #{pl_isJoin});
mapper.select: SELECT PL_SEQ, PL_NAME, USER_ID, PL_LOC, PL_POWER, BS_NUM, PL_ISJOIN FROM PLANTS_TB WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id};

SELECT PARTY_SEQ, PARTY_TITLE, PARTY_CONTENT, PARTY_LOC, START_AT, END_AT, PARTY_VIEWS, TARGET_CNT, NOW_CNT, CREATED_AT, USER_ID, USER_NICK, PARTY_ISJOIN FROM PARTY_BOARDS_TB WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};
SELECT B_SEQ, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, B_VIEWS, HD_CODE, HD_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NICK FROM BOARDS_TB WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};
SELECT LIST_SEQ, PARTY_SEQ, PARTY_TITLE, PL_SEQ, PL_NAME, USER_NICK, PL_POWER, PL_ISJOIN FROM PARTY_LIST_TB WHERE PARTY_SEQ = (SELECT PARTY_SEQ WHERE USER_NICK=#{user_nick}) AND PL_ISJOIN = 1;
SELECT LIST_SEQ, PARTY_SEQ, PARTY_TITLE, PL_SEQ, PL_NAME, USER_NICK, PL_POWER, PL_ISJOIN FROM PARTY_LIST_TB WHERE PARTY_SEQ = (SELECT PARTY_SEQ WHERE USER_NICK=#{user_nick}) AND PL_ISJOIN = 0;

SELECT PARTY_SEQ, PARTY_TITLE, PARTY_CONTENT, PARTY_LOC, START_AT, END_AT, PARTY_VIEWS, TARGET_CNT, NOW_CNT, CREATED_AT, USER_ID, USER_NICK, PARTY_ISJOIN FROM PARTY_BOARDS_TB WHERE PARTY_SEQ = #{party_seq};
